info.title: Statutory Reporting Task
info.description:
The service contains entities that represent the actions you can complete with this API. Each entity contained in this service is named after an action of Document and Reporting Compliance Task.
- Task – Manage an Ad hoc task for the specified report.
- Phase – Manage phases for the specified report.
- Activity – Manage the activities for the specified report.
- Run – Manage runs for the specified report.
- RunParameter – Check the Run parameters used for the specified report.

x-sap-shortText: Generate statutory reports for Brazil using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - ACR Services for Partner Enablement Integration(SAP_COM_0775)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Activity HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
